challenge: Quality assurance for industrial control systems across multiple platforms and configurations
solution: Deployed AskUI CLI to orchestrate testing across Windows-based control systems and embedded devices
quote: The platform-agnostic approach of AskUI allowed us to test our systems comprehensively across all target environments.
author: Anna Schmidt, Director of Product Quality
content:
SEW Eurodrive, a leading manufacturer of drive technology, needed a comprehensive testing solution for their industrial control systems.

## The Challenge

Testing industrial control systems across multiple platforms and configurations was a complex task. The company needed a solution that could handle diverse environments and provide consistent results.

## The Solution

AskUI CLI was deployed to orchestrate testing across Windows-based control systems and embedded devices. The platform's flexibility allowed SEW Eurodrive to test comprehensively across all target environments.

## Results

The implementation delivered impressive results:

- 95% increase in test coverage
- 60% reduction in testing costs
- 40% faster time-to-market
- Improved product reliability by 85%

## Impact

SEW Eurodrive has significantly improved their product quality while reducing testing costs and time-to-market. The automation has enabled them to test more comprehensively than ever before.
